row.Docu:
= Action name = PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PUB.ACTION.GET_SUBSCRIPTION_INFO
= General description = This action is used to fetch Subscription details from Azure system as per the specified Subscription Id. We also need to specify the path to authentication Keystore .jks file and Keystore password in order to connect to Azure system. The Output of this action will be an xml printed in the Job report containing detailed information of the specified Azure Subscription. The XML will have the following structure:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <Subscription xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/windowsazure" xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <SubscriptionID>39f62c91-1d8a-4ada-8fa7-eeca3d8b7a92</SubscriptionID> <SubscriptionName>Microsoft Partner Network</SubscriptionName> <SubscriptionStatus>Active</SubscriptionStatus> <AccountAdminLiveEmailId>florian.krebs@uc4.com</AccountAdminLiveEmailId> <ServiceAdminLiveEmailId>florian.krebs@uc4.com</ServiceAdminLiveEmailId> <MaxCoreCount>20</MaxCoreCount> <MaxStorageAccounts>100</MaxStorageAccounts> <MaxHostedServices>20</MaxHostedServices> <CurrentCoreCount>10</CurrentCoreCount> <CurrentHostedServices>19</CurrentHostedServices> <CurrentStorageAccounts>14</CurrentStorageAccounts> <MaxVirtualNetworkSites>50</MaxVirtualNetworkSites> <CurrentVirtualNetworkSites>4</CurrentVirtualNetworkSites> <MaxLocalNetworkSites>20</MaxLocalNetworkSites> <CurrentLocalNetworkSites>1</CurrentLocalNetworkSites> <MaxDnsServers>20</MaxDnsServers> </Subscription>
= Inputs = * Subscription ID : ID of the subscription which will be used for this connection * Keystore Location : Path to keystore file * Keystore Password : Password to access the keystore * Overwrite Agent : Overwrites the default agent * Overwrite Login : Overwrites the default login
= Behavior = (see general description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 in case of success. * Return code is 1 in case of failure. * Return code is 2 in case of connection timed out !!
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = AE logs will be displayed in the AE report. Java logs will be created at \temp\azure.log under agent installation directory.
= Example = (none)
